header.note: The source node in most cases contains the sample message as written by the developer. If it looks like a dot-delimitted string such as "form.label.firstname", then the developer has not provided a default message.

trans-unit.source: Please enter email. We will search through our database and add this user to your profile.
trans-unit.target: 请输入电子邮件地址。我们会在数据库中搜索并将该用户添加到您的档案。

trans-unit.source: This reservation was processed using AI. Please check the details below for accuracy. If there's a problem, please %href_on%remove this reservation%href_off% from your timeline.
trans-unit.target: 该预订是使用人工智能处理的。请检查以下详细信息是否准确。如果有问题，请从您的时间线中%href_on%移除此预订%href_off%。

trans-unit.source: This reservation was processed using AI. Please check the details below for accuracy.
trans-unit.target: 该预订是使用人工智能处理的。请检查以下详细信息是否准确。
或者，输入一个自定义价值

trans-unit.note: Here “custom value” means the price of the flight that you set yourself.

trans-unit.source: We estimated your savings based on a similar flight, tap here to view it or to set your own value of an alternative flight
trans-unit.target: 我们根据类似航班估算了您节省的费用，点击这里查看或设置您自己的替代航班价值

trans-unit.source: To view your report, please add one or more of the following accounts:
trans-unit.target: 要查看您的报告，请添加以下一个或多个账户：

trans-unit.source: You can add some more credit cards:
trans-unit.target: 您可以添加更多信用卡：

trans-unit.source: Once you have added one or more of these accounts, please come back to this screen to see your personal Credit Card Spend Analysis report!
trans-unit.target: 您添加了一个或多个账户之后，请返回此页面查看您的个人信用卡消费分析报告！

trans-unit.source: None of your credit card accounts have any valid transactions that can be analyzed for this report. If you have other banking accounts, please add them and then come back to view the report.
trans-unit.target: 您的信用卡账户中没有任何可用于此报告分析的有效交易。如果您有其他银行账户，请添加，然后回来查看报告。

trans-unit.note: This field shows how much all your points combined worth in US dollars.
The field shows how many points a user has in total.

trans-unit.source: Balance Watch Credits allow you to schedule frequent updating of an account until we detect the desired change in balance. You can read more about this feature %link_on%here%link_off%.
trans-unit.target: 余额关注点数让您可以设置频繁更新一个账户，直到我们检测到预期的余额变化。要进一步了解该功能，请点击%link_on%这里%link_off%。
trans-unit.note: What is Balance Watch? Balance Watch monitors a loyalty account to alert you as soon as your balance changes. To use this feature users should purchase Balance Watch Credits. https://www.dropbox.com/s/5vppcwcsg90gezp/Balance%20Watch.png?dl=0

This is a name of the button. What is Balance Watch? Balance Watch monitors a loyalty account to alert you as soon as your balance changes. To use this feature users should purchase Balance Watch Credits. https://www.dropbox.com/s/5vppcwcsg90gezp/Balance%20Watch.png?dl=0
It’s about lounge working hours. https://www.dropbox.com/scl/fi/qk0pgwxhkzjng7aebtzpq/closing-in.png?rlkey=wrj00cuecptkt8hzsgakvwpjq

trans-unit.source: Please confirm you want to delete this %subject%
trans-unit.note: The whole phrase will look like "Please confirm you want to delete this picture". You are translating only "Please confirm you want to delete this"

trans-unit.source: Please confirm you want to delete %num% %subject%
trans-unit.note: The whole phrase will look like "Please confirm you want to delete pictures". Your are translating only "Please confirm you want to delete".

trans-unit.source: You are about to delete %name%`s name from your profile, please note that since %name% is not a connected user with a separate AwardWallet account all of the loyalty accounts (if any) that belong to this user will be transferred to you automatically?
trans-unit.target: 您将要从您的档案中删除%name%的姓名，请注意，因为%name%并不是一个关联的独立的AwardWallet用户，该姓名下的所有忠诚度账户（如果有）都会自动转移到您的名下。

trans-unit.source: Are you sure, you want to delete %email% mailbox?
trans-unit.target: 您是否确定要删除%email%邮箱？

trans-unit.source: Please confirm you want to delete this QR code
trans-unit.target: 请确认您要删除该二维码

trans-unit.source: Your account happens to be an owner of "%company_name%" business.%br%If you delete your personal account all of the programs that are assigned to you will be deleted. In addition to that, you will lose access to the business.%br%To make sure you understand that please login to business account and edit your Account Access level to say "No Access". After that you will be able to delete your personal account.
trans-unit.target: 您的账户是“%company_name%”企业的所有者。%br%如果您删除个人账户，则分配给您的所有计划都会被删除。之外，您将无法再访问该企业账户。%br%为确保您理解，请登录该企业账户并编辑您的账户访问权限级别为“禁止访问”。之后，您就可以删除您的个人账户。

trans-unit.source: Are you sure you want to delete all discovered loyalty accounts?
trans-unit.target: 您确定要删除该账户吗？
删除所有发现的忠诚度账户

trans-unit.source: The following loyalty accounts were found via your mailbox; please tap each account to set it up. Swipe left to delete or tap "Add Other Loyalty Accounts" at the top to add other accounts.
trans-unit.target: 通过您的邮箱找到了以下忠诚度账户；请点击每个账户进行设置。向左滑动以删除或点击顶部的“添加其他忠诚度账户”以添加其他账户。
为所有零售卡启用通知

trans-unit.source: These cards don’t charge a foreign transaction fee for purchases made overseas.
trans-unit.target: 这些卡对海外购物不收取境外交易费。

trans-unit.note: Please, don’t translate the placeholder (%cards%)

trans-unit.source: * According to our records, you have all these credit cards. We make the best effort to verify which cards don't have foreign transaction fees, but ultimately you need to confirm it with your bank. AwardWallet is not liable if you get charged a fee by your bank.
trans-unit.target: *根据我们的记录，您拥有这些信用卡。我们尽最大努力验证哪些卡没有境外交易费用，但最终您需要与发卡银行确认。如果银行向您收取费用，AwardWallet不承担任何责任。

trans-unit.source: The fingerprint didn't match, please try again.
trans-unit.target: 指纹不匹配，请再试一次。

trans-unit.source: The authentication was not successful, the device is currently locked out. Please try again later.
trans-unit.target: 身份验证未成功，设备当前已被锁定。请稍后再试。

trans-unit.note: Our users can connect their AwardWallet accounts to other AwardWallet accounts. Once that person accepts your invitation you can choose what exactly you wish to share, and that person will select what to share as well. Access level: https://www.dropbox.com/s/xce5uamysk03f8n/access%20type.png?dl=0

You may group several reservations into a Trip. For example, you are going to Paris. You create a trip including flights to and from Paris, hotel reservation in Paris and car rental. Please see how it looks like: https://www.dropbox.com/s/4xhd6fv9d2ummlu/Trip%20borders.png?dl=0

trans-unit.source: Image could not be downloaded, please try again.
Image failed to upload, please try again.
You need to activate the Location Service to use this feature. Please turn on the "High Accuracy" mode in the location settings
trans-unit.target: 您需要激活位置服务才能使用此功能。请在位置服务设置中开启“高精度”模式

trans-unit.source: View the list of all subscribed locations
trans-unit.target: 查看所有订阅位置的列表

trans-unit.source: The service is disabled. If you turn it on we will be able to deliver your bonus card with the barcode right to your home screen when you come close to your favorite grocery store or a restaurant.
trans-unit.target: 服务已关闭如果您打开此功能，当您靠近您最喜爱的超市或餐厅时，我们就可以把带有条形码的奖励卡直接显示在主屏幕上。

trans-unit.source: The service is enabled. When you come close to the location of a grocery store or a restaurant the bonus card and the barcode will appear on your home screen. You can set up all of your favorite grocery store and restaurant locations inside the AwardWallet app
trans-unit.target: 服务已开启当您靠近超市或餐馆的位置时，奖励卡和条形码将显示在您的主屏幕上。您可以在AwardWallet应用程序中设置所有您喜欢的超市和餐厅位置

trans-unit.source: The access to your mailbox, %email%, has expired. This access enables AwardWallet to automatically manage your travel itineraries and update specific loyalty accounts. To maintain these services, please re-authorize AwardWallet's access to your mailbox.
trans-unit.target: 对您的邮箱%email%的访问权限已过期。有了访问权限AwardWallet就能够自动管理您的行程并更新特定的忠诚度账户。要保持这些服务，请重新授权AwardWallet访问您的邮箱。

trans-unit.source: Please link your mailbox to your AwardWallet account so that we can do all the work for you! Specifically, we will scan you mailbox for the loyalty programs you participate in and will add them to your profile automatically.
trans-unit.target: 请将您的邮箱链接到您的AwardWallet账户，以便我们为您完成所有工作！具体来说，我们会在您的邮箱中扫描您参与的忠诚度计划，并自动将其添加到您的个人档案中。

trans-unit.source: If we find upcoming travel plans in your inbox we will also have them imported into AwardWallet. This is the easiest way to get set up with AwardWallet. We will not be gathering any of your contacts or sending any of them any emails. This step is needed only to get your AwardWallet account set up.
trans-unit.target: 如果我们在您的收件箱中找到即将到来的旅行计划，我们也会将它们导入AwardWallet。这是设置AwardWallet的最简单方法。我们不会收集您的任何联系人信息或发送任何电子邮件。这一步骤只是用于设置您的AwardWallet账户。

trans-unit.note: Here we show which credit card to use with a specific merchant to maximize your rewards: https://www.dropbox.com/s/g5vs6gjmb85v6lj/Merchant_Category_Lookup_Tool.png?dl=0
Another way to maximize your rewards where search is done by a credit card and category: https://www.dropbox.com/s/m26sntiece0zmq4/Merchant_Category_Code_Reverse_Lookup__Beta_.png?dl=0

trans-unit.source: We estimate the value of points based on travel redemptions.
trans-unit.target: 我们根据旅行兑换来估计积分的价值。

trans-unit.source: Tap to see more values, or set your own.
trans-unit.target: 点击查看更多价值，或自行设定价值。

trans-unit.source: To calculate the value of your %programName% miles, please specify what a single %programName% mile is worth to you in US cents.
trans-unit.target: 要计算您%programName%里程的价值，请指定一英里%programName%里程对您的价值（以美分计）。

trans-unit.source: Override the value with your own estimate
trans-unit.target: 用您自己的估计值覆盖该值

trans-unit.source: In order to control where the trip ends or begins just touch and hold the beginning or the end of the trip and move that border up or down.
trans-unit.target: 要控制行程的结束或开始，只需触摸并长按行程的开始或结束，然后上下移动该边框。
trans-unit.note: https://www.dropbox.com/s/4xhd6fv9d2ummlu/Trip%20borders.png?dl=0

Our users can connect their AwardWallet accounts to other AwardWallet accounts. Once that person accepts your invitation you can choose what exactly you wish to share, and that person will select what to share as well. Access level: https://www.dropbox.com/s/xce5uamysk03f8n/access%20type.png?dl=0

trans-unit.source: Long press this notification to instantly scan the bar code
trans-unit.target: 长按此通知可立即扫描条形码

trans-unit.source: Please enable Notifications by tapping "Settings" and choosing "Allow Notifications" under the "Notifications" settings.
trans-unit.target: 点击“设置”并选择“通知”设置下的“允许通知”即可启用通知。

trans-unit.source: AwardWallet does not have the ability to send notifications

trans-unit.note: It’s similar to “closing in”. But this line tells when the lounge is going to open.

trans-unit.source: If you did this by mistake you can undo this by pressing the "Undo" button below.
trans-unit.target: 如果您这是误操作，按下面的“撤销”按钮即可撤销操作。

trans-unit.source: Showing all of your loyalty account expirations where expiration is known
trans-unit.target: 显示所有账户已知的过期日期

trans-unit.source: More comprehensive monitoring and tracking of your flights
trans-unit.target: 更全面地监视并跟踪您的航班
显示更多奖励账户属性

trans-unit.source: %p_on%AwardWallet Plus is a subscription-based service, the subscription length is 1 year and when you subscribe it will be set to auto-renew every year thereafter. The cost of the subscription is $29.99 per year without a an early supporter discount, and $9.99 per year with an early supporter discount.%p_off%%p_on%AwardWallet Plus subscriptions purchased from the app will be charged to your %store% account and will automatically renew within 24 hours prior to the end of the current subscription period, unless auto-renewal is disabled beforehand. To manage your subscriptions or to disable auto-renewal, after purchase, go to your %store% account settings. No refunds will be issued after the annual subscription fee has been charged. Any unused portion of a free trial period will be forfeited once a subscription is purchased.%p_off%%p_on%For more details please feel free to review our %link_1%Terms of Use%link_off% and our %link_2%Privacy Policy%link_off%.%p_off%
trans-unit.target: %p_on%AwardWallet Plus是一项基于订阅的服务，订阅期为1年。当您订购该服务时，系统设置为每年自动更新订阅。订阅费用为每年 %price%。%p_off%%p_on%在应用中购买的AwardWallet Plus订阅会从您的%store%账户中扣款并且会在当前订阅期结束之前24小时自动续订，除非您提前关闭了自动续订。在购买之后，要管理您的订阅或关闭自动续订，请前往您的%store%账户设置。年度订阅费用扣除之后无法退款。购买订阅之后，剩余的免费试用期即作废。%p_off%%p_on%有关详细信息，请随时查看我们的%link_1%使用条款%link_off%和%link_2%隐私政策%link_off%。%p_off%

trans-unit.source: When your update all of you accounts they are updated in parallel, up to 5x faster
trans-unit.target: 当您更新所有账户时，账户会并行更新，最高速度可达5倍
并发更新，最高速度可达5倍

trans-unit.note: Short form of "switch off". The translation should be short, not more than 2-3 characters or leave the English form.
Short form of "switch on". The translation should be short, not more than 2-3 characters or leave the English form.
https://www.dropbox.com/scl/fi/2rshcc0d24fizyzhf1iy7/transaction-analyzer-filter.amount.exact.jpg?rlkey=18gmur8xbn60evae97v5yplle Please, do not remove the dollar sign.
https://www.dropbox.com/scl/fi/70tillsr0c3vlhjdfh13r/trips.segment.trip-for.jpg?rlkey=gkzz46k3yx1cgr53ni2dm5btq
https://www.dropbox.com/scl/fi/r0hbkm0sdy2uwakr8m43m/two-factor.copy-key.png?rlkey=zekc3p64n0ws8s44nm8zw9y3p

trans-unit.source: To set up two-factor authentication manually, please copy the key above and paste it into the authentication app of your choice, such as 1Password, Google Authenticator, Authy, Duo Mobile, etc. Once done your app will start generating a random one-time code every 30 seconds, please copy this code and press Next below.
trans-unit.target: 要手动设置双因素身份验证，请复制上面的密钥并将其粘贴到您选择的身份验证应用程序中，例如1Password、Google Authenticator、Authy、Duo Mobile等。完成后，您的应用程序将开始每30秒生成一个随机的一次性代码，请复制此代码并按“下一步”。

trans-unit.source: Set Up via iOS Password Manager
Enter the 6-digit login code generated by your authentication app
trans-unit.target: 输入您的身份验证应用程序生成的6位登录代码

trans-unit.source: Two-factor authentication adds an extra layer of security to your account by requiring a unique one-time code when you log in to AwardWallet. A separate app will generate this one-time code outside of AwardWallet, such as 1Password, Google Authenticator, Authy, Duo Mobile, etc.
trans-unit.target: 双因素身份验证会在您登录AwardWallet时要求提供唯一的一次性代码，以此为您的账户增加额外的安全层。在AwardWallet之外的另一个应用程序会生成这个一次性代码，比如1Password、Google Authenticator、Authy、Duo Mobile等。
通过第三方应用程序设置
为您的账户%br%添加额外的安全性！

trans-unit.source: Are you sure you want to update all of your accounts?
trans-unit.target: 您确定要更新该账户吗？

trans-unit.source: Choose to update either all of your accounts or just the enabled accounts that haven't been updated in the last 30 days.
trans-unit.target: 选择更新您的所有账户或仅更新过去30天内未更新的已启用账户。

trans-unit.source: You don't have any accounts that can be updated.
trans-unit.target: 您没有可以更新的账户。

trans-unit.note: https://www.dropbox.com/scl/fi/p9g48gvlg5t3yf38863t7/upgrade-to.jpg?rlkey=sq7ahkzz7jcqj6syh6hx9tw90

trans-unit.source: If you delete your personal account all of the programs that are assigned to you will be deleted. In addition to that you will lose access to the business account.
trans-unit.target: 如果您删除了您的个人账户，所有分配给您的奖励计划都会被删除。此外，您将无法再访问该企业账户。
